name: Permanent Sheen of Zanza
tooltip:
Permanent Sheen of Zanza
Item Level 65
Binds when picked up
Unique
Requires Level 55
Use: Increases the chance that the player will reflect hostile spells cast on them by 3% for 2 hrs. Will automatically reflect the first offensive spell cast against the user. Only one type of Zanza potion may be active at any given time.
"Blessed with the mojo of Zanza!"
